amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike all after the enacting clause.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 112-144 to strike all after the enacting clause.

action.text: Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 254 (Roll no. 571).
